11 from geometry_msgs.msg import Pose, Quaternion, Point

21 class EstimatedIMUBoxStateManager():
22  def __init__(self, model_names, init_poses=None, sdf=True):
23  """
24  Spawns the IMU model.
25 
26  Arguments
27  ---------
28  `model_names`: `List[str]`
29  The model names for the IMU
30 
31  `init_poses`: `List[geometry_msgs.msg.Pose]`
32  `[Pose(Position xyz, Orientation quaternion)]`
33 
34  `sdf`: `bool`
35  launch from sdf or urdf
36  """
37  self.model_names = model_names
38  self.n = len(model_names)
39  self.sdf = sdf
40  ros_robotic_skin_path = rospkg.RosPack().get_path('ros_robotic_skin')
41 
42  rospy.wait_for_service('/gazebo/set_model_state')
43  if sdf:
44  rospy.wait_for_service('/gazebo/spawn_sdf_model')
45  self.spawn_model = rospy.ServiceProxy('/gazebo/spawn_sdf_model', SpawnModel)
46  model_path = os.path.join(ros_robotic_skin_path, 'robots/imubox/model.sdf')
47  self.set_model_state = rospy.ServiceProxy('/gazebo/set_model_state', SetModelState)
48  with open(model_path, 'r') as f:
49  xml_string = f.read().replace('\n', '')
50  else:
51  rospy.wait_for_service('/gazebo/spawn_urdf_model')
52  self.spawn_model = rospy.ServiceProxy('/gazebo/spawn_urdf_model', SpawnModel)
53  model_path = os.path.join(ros_robotic_skin_path, 'robots/imu.urdf')
54  self.set_link_state = rospy.ServiceProxy('/gazebo/set_link_state', SetLinkState)
55  with open(model_path, 'r') as f:
56  xml_string = f.read()
57 
58  if init_poses is None:
59  q = tf.transformations.quaternion_from_euler(0, 0, 0)
60  orientation = Quaternion(q[0], q[1], q[2], q[3])
61  position = Point(0.0, 0.0, 0.0)
62  init_pose = Pose(position=position, orientation=orientation)
63  init_poses = [init_pose for i in range(self.n)]
64 
65  self.init_poses = init_poses
66  self.req = SpawnModelRequest()
67  self.req.model_xml = xml_string
68 
69  def spawn(self):
70  """
71  Spawns the IMU model with the poses defined earlier in
72  `__init__`
73  """
74  for model_name, pose in zip(self.model_names, self.init_poses):
75  try:
76  self.req.model_name = model_name
77  init_pose = Pose()
78  init_pose.position.x = pose.position[0]
79  init_pose.position.y = pose.position[1]
80  init_pose.position.z = pose.position[2] # + 0.91488
81  init_pose.orientation.x = pose.orientation[0]
82  init_pose.orientation.y = pose.orientation[1]
83  init_pose.orientation.z = pose.orientation[2]
84  init_pose.orientation.w = pose.orientation[3]
85  self.req.initial_pose = init_pose
86  rospy.wait_for_service('/gazebo/spawn_sdf_model')
87  self.spawn_model(self.req)
88  except rospy.ServiceException as e:
89  rospy.loginfo("Service call failed: %s" % e)
90 
91  def set_poses(self, names, poses):
92  """
93  Sets the poses of the IMU.
94 
95  Arguments
96  ---------
97  `names`: `List[str]`
98  The names of the IMUs
99 
100  `poses`: `List[geometry_msgs.msg.Pose]`
101  The poses of the IMUs
102  """
103  for name, pose in zip(names, poses):
104  self.set_pose(name, pose)
105 
106  def set_pose(self, name, pose):
107  """
108  Sets a pose of an IMU
109 
110  Arguments
111  ---------
112  `name`: `str`
113  The name of the IMU
114 
115  `poses`: `geometry_msgs.msg.Pose`
116  The pose of the IMU
117  """
118  init_pose = Pose()
119  init_pose.position.x = pose.position[0]
120  init_pose.position.y = pose.position[1]
121  init_pose.position.z = pose.position[2] # + 0.91488
122  init_pose.orientation.x = pose.orientation[0]
123  init_pose.orientation.y = pose.orientation[1]
124  init_pose.orientation.z = pose.orientation[2]
125  init_pose.orientation.w = pose.orientation[3]
126  if self.sdf:
127  try:
128  state_msg = ModelState()
129  state_msg.model_name = name
130  state_msg.pose = init_pose
131  state_msg.reference_frame = "world"
132  rospy.wait_for_service('/gazebo/set_model_state')
133  self.set_model_state(state_msg)
134  except rospy.ServiceException as e:
135  rospy.loginfo("Service call failed: %s" % e)
136  else:
137  try:
138  link_msg = LinkState()
139  link_msg.link_name = name
140  link_msg.pose = init_pose
141  link_msg.reference_frame = "world"
142  rospy.wait_for_service('/gazebo/set_link_state')
143  self.set_link_state(state_msg)
144  except rospy.ServiceException as e:
145  rospy.loginfo("Service call failed: %s" % e)

147 
148 class TrueIMUBoxStateManager():
149  def __init__(self, names):
150  """
151  TrueIMUBoxStateManager class.
152 
153  Arguments
154  ---------
155  `names`: `List[str]`
156  The names of the IMUs
157  """
158  self.names = names
159  self.n = len(names)
160 
161  self.get_link_state = rospy.ServiceProxy('/gazebo/get_link_state', GetLinkState)
162  rospy.wait_for_service('/gazebo/get_link_state')
163 
164  def get_poses(self):
165  """
166  Gets the poses of the given links
167 
168  """
169  poses = np.zeros((self.n, 7))
170  for i, name in enumerate(self.names):
171  resp = self.get_link_state(name, 'world')
172  if resp.success:
173  pose = resp.link_state.pose
174  poses[i, :] = np.r_[pose.position, pose.orientation]
175 
176  return poses
177 
178 
179 def load_estimated_poses(filename):
180  """
181  Loads the poses
182 
183  Arguments
184  ---------
185  `filename`: `str`
186  The filename to get the `np.array`
187  """
188  ros_robotic_skin_path = rospkg.RosPack().get_path('ros_robotic_skin')
189  return np.loadtxt(os.path.join(ros_robotic_skin_path, 'data', filename))
190 
191 
192 if __name__ == '__main__':
193  # rospy.init_node("set_estimated_imu_positions")
194  parser = argparse.ArgumentParser(description='IMU Spawner')
195  parser.add_argument('-r', '--robot', type=str, default='panda',
196  help="Currently only 'panda' and 'sawyer' are supported")
197  parser.add_argument('-p', '--picklepath', type=str, default='OM_data.pkl',
198  help="Path to pickle file from within the data directory.")
199  parser.add_argument('-f', '--frequency', type=float, default=10.0,
200  help='Frequency at which the animation occurs.')
201  args = parser.parse_args()
202  robot = args.robot
203 
204  # data from corresponding method
205  filename = args.picklepath
206 
207  frequency = args.frequency
208  ros_robotic_skin_path = rospkg.RosPack().get_path('ros_robotic_skin')
209  load_path = os.path.join(ros_robotic_skin_path, 'data', filename)
210 
211  if os.path.exists(load_path):
212  dh_params_data = pickle.load(open(load_path, 'rb'))
213  else:
214  raise EnvironmentError("File not found!")
215  # dh_params_data shape is (num_su, optimization_steps, dh_params)
216  if robot == 'panda':
217  controller = PandaController()
218  elif robot == 'sawyer':
219  controller = SawyerController()
220  else:
221  raise ValueError("Must be either panda or sawyer")
222 
223  # poses = load_estimated_poses(filename)
224  positions = np.zeros(7)
225  controller.publish_positions(positions, sleep=1)
226  # imu_names = ['imu_link0', 'imu_link1', 'imu_link2',
227  # 'imu_link3', 'imu_link4', 'imu_link5', 'imu_link6']
228  # link_names = ['panda::'+imu_name for imu_name in imu_names]
229  # panda_imu_manager = TrueIMUBoxStateManager(link_names)
230  # defined_poses = panda_imu_manager.get_poses()
231  # print(defined_poses)
232  # Set initial poses
233  # dh_params_data shape is (num_su, optimization_steps, dh_params)
234  r = rospy.Rate(frequency)
235  n_imu = len(dh_params_data)
236  model_names = ['imu%i' % (i) for i in range(n_imu)]
237  poses = np.zeros((n_imu, 7))
238  init_poses = [Pose(position=pose[:3], orientation=pose[3:]) for pose in poses]
239  state_manager = EstimatedIMUBoxStateManager(model_names, init_poses)
240  state_manager.spawn()
241  optimization_lengths = []
242  for su_idx, val in enumerate(dh_params_data):
243  optimization_lengths.append(len(dh_params_data[su_idx]))
244 
245  optimization_lengths = np.array(optimization_lengths)
246  indices = [0] * 6
247  su_idx = 0
248  done_amt = 0
249  while True:
250  if indices[su_idx] == optimization_lengths[su_idx]:
251  # skip su.
252  pass
253  else:
254  pose = dh_params_data[su_idx][indices[su_idx]]
255  pose = Pose(position=pose[:3], orientation=pose[3:])
256  state_manager.set_pose(model_names[su_idx], pose)
257 
258  indices[su_idx] += 1
259  if indices[su_idx] == optimization_lengths[su_idx]:
260  done_amt += 1
261  if done_amt == n_imu:
262  break
263  su_idx += 1
264  su_idx %= n_imu
265  print('Optimization steps for imus:', indices)
266  r.sleep()
267 
268  # error = np.linalg.norm(defined_poses - poses)
269  # print(error)
